Check out www.aestheticsofexclusion.com! üìçIt was designed & coded by an honourable young man by the name of @jmpleass, don't miss his other interactive work as well. The fresh logo is made by @markjan.vantellingen. We hope to share our past, present and future activities here! üìç

Aesthetics of Exclusion is supported by @stimuleringsfonds and we are currently under the umbrella of the artist in residence program @waagsociety. New work will be on show during @museumnacht.amsterdam.
#website #computervision #machinelearning #gentrification #aesthetics #designresearch

sjoerdterborg
New project coming up by Aesthetics of Exclusion in collaboration with @mikaelastebystenfalk!

Work in progress images feature 3D models reconstructed out of Instagram snapshots made by visitors inside the bars of the Amsterdam based group of entrepreneurs called De Drie Wijzen uit Oost.
The project will be presented as part of my residency @waagsociety.

Exhibition will be 2nd of November @museumnacht.amsterdam. Talk 17th of October at Planet B @waagsociety.
Made possible by the European ARTificial Intelligence Lab, with the support of the Creative Europe programme of the European Union. üá™üá∫ #photogrammetry #gentrification #softboyaesthetic #hotspots

sjoerdterborg
Follow the activities of artist studios @deijsbrand on Instagram! This year I became chairman of the board of broedplaats De IJsbrand, a studio building run by and for artists. The most important goal is to have good spaces to produce art/design and make sure we can stay here longterm in a rapidly changing Amsterdam Noord. So to all of you politicians, bureaucrats, fellow broedplaats owners, Noorderlingen, snelle moneyboys & girls: if you have advice for us to make this happen the coming years please do contact me.
These are the üôå artists & designers working from our building:
@diana__scherer, @natureoptimist, @marcusbruystens, @maura_biava, @jaapscheeren, @our_polite_society, @utaeisenreich, @ruiterjanssen, @pimleenen, @studiolonk, @daniel_maarleveld, @debra.urbaniahoeve, @maaikekoning.nl, @koosbuster, @sjoerdknibbeler, @mirtevanlaarhoven, @dewitdesign, @frankbloem, @bas.van.wieringen, Marijn de Wit, Rebekka de Wit, Ingo Valente, Michiel Landeweerd, Rosie Heinrich, David Habets, Anna Fink and Sieto Noordhoorn.
11w

sjoerdterborg
This is Joris, I met him in 2012 in queer club De Trut. He was wearing a wig, sunglasses and a cap, somewhat detached from the here and now. I was directly intrigued by his way of being and we slowly became friends. I also started working as producer on his documentary film Portrait of a failed writer.
At the age of 23, right after finishing the first draft of his novel, Joris starts filming his own life. The novel keeps on getting rejected by publishing houses, but this doesn't make him reconsider his career ambition. He obsessively keeps on writing novels, for 17 years, while the gap widens between who he is and who he wants to be. He tries to ward off failure by turning himself into a fictional character within his cinematic existence. Yet he knows he will have to face up to reality sooner or later.

Finally after all these years, Portrait of a failed writer is finished and this month we will start submitting it to film festivals around the world. If you have any advice hit me up.

The film is supported by @afk020, Mediafonds and was part of Summer Documentary Lab of @uniondocs New York 2015.

#documentary #film #idfa #literature #documentaryfilm #writer #filmfestival

sjoerdterborg
Last one! Some footage from Botanica Variegata of the video-loop installation: 3 screens, 16 minutes each, 30.000 images scraped of 3 hashtags (#monsteradeliciosavariegata #plantsonpink #plantmom). It was presented April 8-14 @alcova.milano Sassetti (curated by @spacecaviar, @studiovedet and in collaboration with @alicestori and @fondazionekenta) during the @fuorisalone.

Research, scraping, software, graphics and coding with Jorrit Schaap, @veravandeseyp and Clara Langlois.

#alcovasassetti #alcova#salonedelmobile2019#aestheticsofexclusion #interiordesign#plantsofinstagram #fuorisalone#salonedelmobile #fuorisalone2019#milandesignweek#milandesignweek2019#artificialintelligence #computervision#machinelearning #urbanjungle #design
25w

sjoerdterborg
Aesthetics of Exclusion presents Botanica Variegata: a system of classification and taxonomy of plants, according to their online presence on Instagram. An algorithmic structure analyses tens of thousands of plant images in relation to their surroundings ‚Äî ranging from cats, dogs, colours, design objects and art to human demographics. What is first seen as variety ultimately results in a process of homogenization.

It was presented April 8-14 @alcova.milano Sassetti (curated by @spacecaviar, @studiovedet and @alicestori) during the @fuorisalone.

Thanks for the features @elledecoritalia, @designatlarge.it, @domusweb and all the others; and grazie mille for this powerhouse team that moved roots and earth for this project.

Art direction: Baratto & Mouravas (@do.you.believe.in.machines & @willnotbetelevized)
Graphic design: @veravandeseyp
Programming: Jorrit Schaap & Vera van de Seyp
Research & production: Clara Langlois.
Researchers Aesthetics of Exclusion: @thomaspewterschmidt, Melvin Wevers and Mark Jan van Tellingen.
#alcovasassetti #alcova #salonedelmobile2019 #aestheticsofexclusion #interiordesign #plantsofinstagram #fuorisalone #salonedelmobile #fuorisalone2019 #milandesignweek #milandesignweek2019 #artificialintelligence #computervision #machinelearning #urbanjungle #design

sjoerdterborg
Happy to announce Beach Umbrella (ÌååÎùºÏÜî), which I directed with Mark Jan van Tellingen, has been taken in to distribution by @lima_media_art. LIMA is the platform in the Netherlands for media art, new technologies and digital culture, where the discipline is actively questioned and where the field, and its position in society is reflected on. They will show the film internationally, and also important, preserve it in their archive for future generations. The shots above give a - at that time unknown - hint to new things we are working on with the Aesthetics of Exclusion team. More info be announced soon!
#mediaart #computervision #aestheticsofexclusion #urbanjungle

sjoerdterborg
My students of @uniundergrd are having their interim exhibition!
Join us next week on Thursday/Friday/Saturday. There will be some tips & tricks about euthanasia on cruise ships, a neat deconstruction of conspiracy theories, ice sculptures questioning the history of slavery, counterfeiting industries (the future is fake), branding as a system of sorcery, some influencer endorsing going on, changing dessert borders, social housing horror music, supply chain broadcasts, cartoon tv shows, thoughts about unplugging in De Trut & Vrankrijk and free lollipops questioning sugar itself.

Thursday is also the open day of the whole @sandberginstituut so you can visit all the other departments as well. See you there.

sjoerdterborg
Last week Mark Jan van Tellingen and I won the Icarus Award: a Dutch prize for art works reflecting about technology and society! It was awarded by jury president and former Minister of State Tineke Netelenbos who called our film Beach Umbrella a front runner example project on art & science.

Shout out to everyone who helped out: Jorrit Schaap (programming), @markijzerman (sound design), our science team (@thomaspewterschmidt and Melvin Wevers), the Summer Sessions program by @artcenternabi & @v2unstable, @stimuleringsfonds and everyone in Seoul who helped me in my research!

sjoerdterborg
On show from September 5 until October 5:
Beach Umbrella is a short film in which a computer categorizes the city of Seoul using Street View archives. It shows the past, present and future of one of the objects often used by small businesses and street vendors: the beach umbrella.

Directed by Mark Jan van Tellingen & Sjoerd ter Borg. The film is part of the Summer Sessions program of @v2unstable & @artcenternabi and is supported by @stimuleringsfonds. Photos by Dongkyun Vak and Art Center Nabi.
58w

sjoerdterborg
"Should we classify the luxuriant growth of objects as we do a flora or fauna, complete with tropical and glacial species, sudden mutations, and varieties threatened by extinction?" Next week Mark Jan van Tellingen and I will show our film 'Beach Umbrella'. It looks at the past, present and future of the use of one of the peculiar objects used by small businesses and street vendors in Seoul through the lense of computer vision and street view archives: the beach umbrella.

The exhibition will be on view from 5th of September until the 5th of October at @artcenternabi. Programming by Jorrit Schaap and with advise of @thomaspewterschmidt, dr. Melvin Wevers and all the great Seoul based artists, designers and curators who helped me with my research. Made possible by the summer sessions of @v2unstable and the support of @stimuleringsfonds.

sjoerdterborg
Sneaky picture by @lauren_j_alexander of La clemenza di Tito by director Peter Sellars.
Next week the students of the @uniundergrd and the Master Dramaturgy (UvA) will be using Sellars‚Äô opera as an inspiration and departure point for creating original short opera scenes, and while using the technique of re-enactment, reflect on a collective traumatic event.

See the work at Repeat After Me, Wednesday 16th of May 2pm at the @nationaleoperaballet!

#laclemenzaditito #opera #trauma #reenactment

sjoerdterborg
"There‚Äôs an animal trapped inside the soap factory. As the unnamed creature stalks the afternoon shift, their pack dynamic starts to breakdown. No one wants to confront the fact that this may be more than just a cat." The old soap factory situated at 21 Don Roadway gives a glimpse of Toronto‚Äôs industrial heritage. Just before the site will be demolished and redeveloped in to a 12 million square foot of office and retail space, we invited a writer and a photographer to capture its extraordinary nature in a story. It reveals patterns of social decay, male pack behaviour, apathy and entropy.

Story by @afsulli, photos by @benfreed and design by @studioponto. Photos publication by @sjoerdknibbeler.

#toronto #factory #malepackbehavior
